bibl.title: Between Alexandria and Jerusalem. The Dynamic of Jewish and Hellenistic Culture.

series.title: The Brill Reference Library of Judaism.

bibl.note: See in part. pp. 1-38: Chapter 1. A Quest for Historicism and the Rhetoric of Petitions [apprehends the transformations of Jewish culture against the foil of Greek papyri from Roman and Byzantine Egypt]; - 101-134: Chapter 4. Typology and Pesher in the "Letter of Aristeas"; - 173: Index. Greek Papyri and Inscriptions.
bibl.seg: KOVELMAN Arkady, Between Alexandria and Jerusalem. The Dynamic of Jewish and Hellenistic Culture. (The Brill Reference Library of Judaism. 21.)

See in part. pp. 1-38: Chapter 1. A Quest for Historicism and the Rhetoric of Petitions [apprehends the transformations of Jewish culture against the foil of Greek papyri from Roman and Byzantine Egypt]; - 101-134: Chapter 4. Typology and Pesher in the "Letter of Aristeas"; - 173: Index. Greek Papyri and Inscriptions.
C.R. par Jean A. Straus, AntCl 76 (2007) pp. 518-519.
